type.description:
## Exposed to Sky

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/exposed_to_sky)

Checks whether the entity is currently exposed to the sky, meaning that the sky is currently visible in the entity's position.

Type ID: `origins:exposed_to_sky`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:exposed_to_sky"
}
```

title: Exposed to Sky (Entity Condition Type) date: 2021-04-04

Exposed to Sky

Entity Condition Type

Checks whether the entity is currently exposed to the sky, meaning that the sky is currently visible in the entity's position.

Type ID: origins:exposed_to_sky

Fields

Examples
